text: Q42.| Consider the following statements S1: If G is a connected graph with weighted edges, and all of the weights are different, then different spanning trees of G have different total weights. S2: If G is a connected graph with weighted edges, and e is an edge of G with a smaller weight than any other edge of G, then e must be included in every minimal spanning tree of G. Which of the above statements is/are true? (A) Only S1 (B) Only S2 (C) Both S1 and S2 (D) neither S1 nor S2
